question: Which of the following is an example of genetic engineering?
candidate_answers: (A) Growing a whole plant from a single cell. (B) Finding the sequences of bases in plant DNA. (C) Inserting a gene into plants that makes them resistant to insects. (D) Attaching the root of one type of plant to the stem of another type of plant.
answer: Inserting a gene into plants that makes them resistant to insects.
label: C
